full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES MGON PO'I BSNYEN YIG DNGOS GRUB KYI SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(MGON PO DE NYID CHOS SKYONG GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BAS BLA MA YI DAM CHOS SKYONG THAMS CAD KYI GO CHOD PA DANG, MCHOG GI DON LA GSOL BA BTAB NA THUN MONGS DNGOS GRUB ZHAR @006B LA 'BYUNG ZHING, THUN MONG GI DON LA GSOL BA BTAB NA MCHOG GI DNGOS GRUB STZOL BA DANG, KHYAD PAR DU DAD PA DANG DAM TSIG GI RJES SU 'BRANG ZHING SKYES BU CHEN PO YIN PA'I GZHAN DON DON GNYER DANG BLA MED BYANG CHUB DON DU GNYER NAS NGES PAR BSTEN DGOS PAR ^ RGYAL BA TZONG KHA BA CHEN POS GSUNGS SO, ,BSNYEN SGRUB LAS GSUM GYI RNAM BZHAG BKA' RGYA SHIN TU DAM ZHING BLO DMAN RNAMS KYIS GO DKA' BAR SNANG BA'I BSNYEN PA'I PHYOGS TZAM ZHIG BKOD PA 'DI NI, BKA' BCU NGAG DBANG RAB BRTAN DANG, DGE SLONG RGYAL MTSAN GNYIS KYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN GYI NA BA CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG DKON MCHOG GIS BGYIS PA'O, ,YE SHES MGON PO'I THUGS MNYES SHING GZHAN LA PHAN THOG PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
